subtitle.en: STAC provides you with high-quality services to help you smoothly adapt to study and life.
subtitle.zh: 斯坦科管理中心为您提供优质的服务，帮助您缓解在国外的异域感并顺利适应新环境下的学习，生活。使您学会在美国独立处理学习生活中的大小事物。当您选择住在这里，您可以有一个全新的开始并结交许多新的同学朋友。

services.en: Airport pickup is provided for each student upon their arrival in the San Francisco area, USA.
Monthly reports can be requested by parents.
Orientation and in-person training for students about living in America
Initial shopping trip for food and necessities.
Area orientation, guidance on transportation to the school.
Help to become familiar with the campus as well as school policies.
Assistance with opening a bank account and setting up a cell phone.
services.zh: 特制的生活安置服务 及针对家长的报告服务和紧急情况服务。

services.en: 24/7 staff on-site to ensure a smooth transition for students in their college life and studies.
services.zh: 其中特制的生活安置服务包括：

services.en: Individual grades management and advice available upon request
services.zh: 初次食品和生活必需品的购物。

services.en: Legal advice if the student encounters any legal issues including school suspension.
services.zh: 当地介绍，公共交通指导。

services.en: 24/7 services assist students and their parents in case of emergencies.
services.zh: 帮助熟悉校园及学校政策。

services.en: Guardianship services are available for individuals under 18 years old.
services.zh: 协助开设银行账户及办理手机号服务。
